brand_slogan_2: A new way to find a partner to play games with
terms_agreement: By signing in, you are agreeing to our <0>Terms</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
sign_in_with_phone: Sign in with a phone number
phone_help: A code will be sent to verify that it's really you. Message and data rates may apply.
phone_changed: Click here if you changed your phone number.
enter_code: Enter the code sent to your phone
resend_code_wait: You can resend the code in {{seconds}} seconds
resend_code: Didn't receive it? Click here to resend the code
profile_builder_first_name: Let's find your player 2. What's your first name?
profile_builder_last_name_disclosuer: Your last name will not be shown to other people.
profile_builder_sideous_meme_1: From now on you shall be known
who_do_you_want_to_date: Who do you want to date?
location_access_title: We need location access to find your player 2
notification_access_title: Enable notifications so you don't miss messages from other people
add_profile_picture_disclosure: Add some photos to show off your personality, make sure your face is fully visible!
add_more_profile_pictures_help: Keep going! Add more photos to show off your personality. You can add up to 9 photos
generic_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
